title: Bug 26366[Dialogs] Need to improve label positioning in progress dialogs
description: build I20021113 The message line appears too close to the icon.A bit of horizontal spacinghere would help. There is not quite enough space between the icon and message and the top ofthe dialog. The progress bar is not aligned with the buttons. There is a bit too much space between the progress bar and the buttons. There is a bit too much space to the bottom right of the buttons.Compare with other apps' dialogs.
